name: A Long Night (Mabozi Productions)
description:
Mexican dining was not a good idea.

A long night awaits you!

She faces the nightmares that will try to wake you up and try to resist inside the dream as long as possible.

"Game made in two days for the Manasoup Game Jam 2, so there may be bugs or errors of various kinds.

Any feedback, whether positive or negative, is welcome.

All assets, with the exception of fonts and audio, were made by me.

@Mabozi Productions - Michele Chirra"

Controls:

WASD to move

SPACE for dash

P to pause the game
